metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9756 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The aarch64_ext_ldst_reglist function in opcodes/aarch64-dis.c in GNUBinutils 2.28 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (bufferoverflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impactvia a crafted binary file, as demonstrated by mishandling of this fileduring "objdump -D" execution.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
